reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Verify content menu item 'Content' is present in the site taxonomy.
Verify content menu item 'My Workbench' is present in the site taxonomy.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter 'ca8a3dd7be51414' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post ca8a3dd7be51414 has been created.' is present.
Verify the 'View' is present in the work bench.
Verify the 'Edit Draft' is present in the work bench.
Verify the 'Revisions' is present in the work bench.
Verify the 'Schedule' is present in the work bench.
Click the 'Revisions' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Revisions dialog'.
Verify the number of present revisions entries equals '1'.
Click the 'Schedule' tab.
Switch to the active frame titled 'ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Verify the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link is present.
Verify the scheduled revision table is empty.
Click the 'Edit Draft' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit Post ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit Post ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Enter 'Test Revision 2' in the 'Message for State Change' text area.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify the text 'Revision state' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the text 'Public' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the text 'Moderate' is present in the work bench info block.
Click the 'Revisions' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Revisions dialog'.
Verify the number of present revisions entries equals '2'.
Click the 'Schedule' tab.
Switch to the active frame titled 'ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Click the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Select revision titled 'ca8a3dd7be51414'.
Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
Enter '05/18/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '05:00 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
Click the 'Schedule' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Switch to the active frame titled 'ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text 'ca8a3dd7be51414' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Publish' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '05/18/2014 - 05:00 PM' is present in the scheduled queue.
Click the 'Run now' link for content item 'ca8a3dd7be51414' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'ca8a3dd7be51414 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Completed' is present in the scheduled queue.
Click the 'Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Revisions dialog'.
Verify the text 'Revision was set from Draft to Published on 05/08/2014' is present on the page.
